From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2024 Indian filmTera Kya Hoga LovelyTheatrical release posterDirected byBalwinder Singh JanjuaWritten byBalwinder Singh JanjuaRupinder ChahalAnil Rodhan[1]Story byAnil RodhanKunal MandekarProduced bySony Pictures Films IndiaStarringRandeep HoodaIleana D'CruzKaran KundrraCinematographyAndre MenezesEdited bySanyukta KazaMusic bySongs:Amit TrivediScore:Ketan SodhaProductioncompaniesSony Pictures Films IndiaMovie Tunnel ProductionsDistributed bySony Pictures ReleasingRelease date
8 March 2024 (2024-03-08)
Running time144 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Tera Kya Hoga Lovely is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language social comedy film directed by Balwinder Singh Janjua and produced by Sony Pictures Films India.[2] The film features Randeep Hooda and Ileana D'Cruz in lead roles.[3][4] The film revolves around India's obsession with fair skin.[1][5] The film was theatrically released on 8 March 2024.[6]


Cast[edit]

Randeep Hooda as Inspector Sombir Sangwan
Ileana D'Cruz as Lovely Singh
Karan Kundrra as Gurdeep "Guggu" Dagar
Pavan Malhotra as Hawa Singh, Lovely's father
Rajendra Gupta as Bhanwar Singh, Lovely's uncle
Geetika Vidya Ohlyaan as Hawaldar Chandrawel
Rishabh Bhatia as Chandrawel's husband
Geeta Agarwal Sharma as Renu Kumari, Sombir's mother
Meghna Malik as Lovely's aunt
Shruti Panwar as Shakuntala, Lovely's mother
Sukhwinder Chahal as Dharampal, Lovely's uncle
Ashima Singh as Lovely's grandmother
Vishal Dahiya as Billu, Lovely's cousin
Shivankit Singh Parihar as Lillu, Truck driver
Ishu Kumar as Sunny
Naveen Jagbir Sandhu as Bunty
Divas Haria as Lovely's brother
Pall Singh as Sandeep
Varun Sharma as Ved
Production[edit]
Development[edit]
The film was initially titled Unfair & Lovely, which was later changed to Tera Kya Hoga Lovely.[7][8]

Filming[edit]
Principal photography commenced on 29 October 2020 in Haryana.[9][10] Filming concluded on 19 November 2020.[11]

Music[edit]

The music of the film is composed by Amit Trivedi While lyrics written by Irshad Kamil.[12]
